channel.title: Classic 2006 Website [Almost complete 90%]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]:) Down for updates [/size]
[s]Hi, i was the web developer of 2006Redone before Andrew lost interest in the project, and i decided to release the website.
Includes: -Integrated news system with forum announcements -News archives & categories -Polls (you just have to fix divide by 0 error i never got around to it) -Offences -Moderator actions -Full forums -Quoting -Quick Reply -User profiles -Private messaging -Recovery Questions(recovery system still needs some work) -Moderator forums sections & admin forum sections with permissions -Hiding, moving, locking, stickying threads -Registration -Knowledge Base (html - could be setup correctly) -message center! -EASY admin control panel! -Tons More! -Membership status!
Missing:
-Hiscores -report -recover pass -track a recovery Thats it!
pictures:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RdZpR.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KvtiZ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wNhjT.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nQWKy.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZVyBp.png[/img]
How to change play to beta:
Open Title.ws Search for "play" and you will see a button code. Change 'lev1' to 'beta'
Download includes: The site files A file with a ton of collected and made Icons (if you want to change somethings) the database (cleaned out of course)
how to get .ws to read as PHP:
create an apache handler Handler: application/x-httpd-php5 extension: .ws
How to make someone an admin mod or member:
Go into the database using Phpmyadmin then click users and hit browse find the username you wish to change rights and click inline edit scroll sideways until you see "rights" (its the 0 after there email)
set 2 for admin, 1 for mod, and -1 for Member
edit: config.ws (its in includes) for mysql stuff...
[s]Download:
crowns (icons) https://www.dropbox.com/sh/yezj3bkwdbssheq/XGD0R-OWpb/Crowns.rar
sql (database) https://www.dropbox.com/sh/yezj3bkwdbssheq/FuoSquImyt/sql.rar
site: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/9600238/pokemonn_2006redoneSite.zip[/s]
re-uploaded! SQL:
and its gonna take 2 hrs+ to upload the site
Have fun! if you have any questions feel free to ask[/s]

item.title: Classic 2006 Website [Almost complete 90%]
item.dc:creator: @Vazzily Vazzily
item.description:
@Vazzily wrote:

Hey Alex, this is Vazz from 2006Redone. Its sad that the developement was canceled or that you stopped being web developer but I quit the project anyways for now, after all that drama. I also stopped using 06Scape, I started my very own server.
However thanks for releasing the website source, I will make sure to download and I will not start a remake lol. There are like 150+ Remakes out right now, 3-4 big ones and rest are small ones and fails, whoever starts a remake now has not a chance of going anywhere to be honest.
06Scape already has more or less professional developers, like 30.000$ donations income so far or even more and even they only got like 100-200 online now, which is litterally nothing for the work you put into it.

But as I said, thanks for the time on redone, I will download the site and it might become handy sometimes, or I just experiment with it, we will see.

Vazz

Read full topic

item.title: Classic 2006 Website [Almost complete 90%]
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

[quote=“ou08tlaw, post:34, topic:453997”][quote author=pokemonn link=topic=556871.msg4076496#msg4076496 date=1344891837]
It’s not hard to set up I’ll add a video tutorial tommorow,

Just take the .rar site and upload it (000webhost does not work) then when the .rar is uploaded extract it all the files will be extracted now create a my_sql database then open phpmyadmin and insert the .sql file I gave you then go back to file managers and open config.ws and change the information to yours
[/quote]
If 000webhost dont work which one did you use?[/quote]

Not 1 free one works because all free ones you can’t change apache handler I used hostgator

Read full topic

item.title: Classic 2006 Website [Almost complete 90%]
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

Fridder:

You should just use mediafire. No downtimes, your files won’t just ‘delete’, nor lock when too many people download. Uppit has problems (for example how it was down yesterday for around 6 hours).

Media fire does not support over 400mb the site is 850mb

Read full topic
